      • wasLastMoveFirstMove

        public boolean wasLastMoveFirstMove()
        determines if the last movement was first time moving for this piece
        Returns:

      • isMoveLegal

        public boolean isMoveLegal​(int curr_row,
                           int curr_col,
                           int new_row,
                           int new_col,
                           ChessBoard cb)
        determines if this Pawn's movement is legal, including all kinds of special movements, such as one-square, diagonal, and en passant movement
        Specified by:
        isMoveLegal in class Piece
        Parameters:
        curr_row - current row that the Pawn is in
        curr_col - current column that the Pawn is in
        new_row - row the Pawn moves to
        new_col - column the Pawn moves to
        cb - chessboard
        Returns:
        true if the movement is legal, otherwise false

        currentPlayer - player who uses enPassant
